text:
:HubSpot: *upcoming/In Development API enhancements* :partyparrot: 
<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/product-updates/?update=13974264|Use HubSpot model for message threading>
<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/product-updates/?update=13974269|Channel account connected webhook>
<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/product-updates/?update=13974267|Include channel image and description>
<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/product-updates/?update=13974270|Scopes for marketplace-approved apps to offer to Professional tier>

These all should be visible if you log into any one of your Developer Test Accounts.
